mapper.select: select id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, trigger_type, tigger_scene_id, instructions_id, manual from sys_response where delete_flag = 0 and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_response( id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, trigger_type, tigger_scene_id, instructions_id, manual) values (#{id}, #{createDate}, #{createUser}, #{deleteFlag}, #{remark}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser}, #{triggerType}, #{tiggerSceneId}, #{instructionsId}, #{manual})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from sys_response where delete_flag = 0
and ${item.name} ${item.symbol} #{item.data}
